column4: Hi, I'm trying to do a action with apt, however it seems to be... like, stuck trying to get dependancies.
sudo apt-get -f install doesn't fix it either.
can you expand on the issue and what you're trying to install
ok - the error message is quite clear
it's not just hanging, it's giving you an error explaining the issue
oh, i didn't even look at that; even if that was resolved, it would still try to fix libungif4g
again - look at the error message
yep.  What should I do to resolve that?
you have a dapper archive and a lucid archive in there
you can't mix and match like that
your system will be totally unusable
